check_loop: ^You walk up to a strange warped one way mirror and behind it you see....
^but for some inexplicable reason you know that behind that steined glass is something beckoning you to talk to it...
quest_start: ^[???]: Come here do not be afraid.

c-0: ^You fight back your fear and slowly walk up to the mirror.

walkup: ^[???]: Ah Finally someone new.... Oh but before I forget let me introduce myself, you can call me The Trader.
^[Trader]: Or at least thats what everyone used to call me here back in the day but I'm loosing track of whats important here.
^Are you willing to help me out a bit in here, obviously not for free mind you.

s: ^Nod your head and tell him you agree.
^Shake your head and tell him you disagree.

agree: ^[Trader]: well I didn't expect you to be so willing to help.
disagree: ^[Trader]: well then suit yourself... I know you will be back.
quest: ^[Trader]: Well then all I need of you is to just collect a bunch of scrap for me... nothing dangerous at least for you,
^mind you the wildlife here seems to dislike my boat with a burning passion for whatever reason so make sure to patch it every now and then.

b: ^Well finally... Took you long enough but still here's a treat for a job well done.
^[Trader]: Nice try but I'm not blind at least yet.
